H0.text: Oceanic crust is where Gabbro, a dark dense rock, can be found.

H1.text: Surface crust is where gabbro, a dark dense rock, can be found.

H2.text: Mantle is where Gabbro, a dark dense rock, can be found.

H3.text: Soil is where gabbro, a dark dense rock, can be found.

A4.text: Much of the Earth's oceanic crust is made of gabbro, formed at mid-ocean ridges.
